group_1.textLeft: We're home.

group_1.textRight: It's good to be back. I'll start preparing lunch.

group_1.textLeft: ...*Sniff* Nnn...

group_1.narration: ―Rabi―@This came out of nowhere...@What are you talking about?
―Nayuta―@Looking back on them, I've made countless mistakes...@I want to start over...
―Nayuta―@*Sigh* I didn't mean to alarm you...@I'll stop crying in a moment.

group_1.textLeft: Yesterday in school, we had a class on@the Johari Window.

group_1.textRight: You mentioned it earlier. As I recall, it has@something to do with social psychology.

group_1.textLeft: Yes. As part of our lesson, we discussed@our personalities with the other students.
They evaluated me as a very stubborn person.

group_1.textRight: Well, you are. Did that upset you?

group_1.textLeft: I had my reservations at first.
After some consideration, however,@I agreed with their assessment.
I looked back on my life, you see,
and realized that my stubbornness@has led to dire outcomes.

group_1.textRight: Or have you become aware of some@serious mistakes?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. My failings pertain to my@relationships with others.
I've never been one to change my mind...
...once I judge someone's character.
So in light of my lesson yesterday, when I saw@Mikage and Sudachi fighting,
it reminded me of what I had@done in the past.
Thus I interceded.

group_1.textRight: And because you did that, it all worked out.@Doesn't that satisfy you?

group_1.textLeft: No, it does not. Because when I saw@them reconcile,
the gravity of my errors became@even more crushing.
I did not realize the significance of@my mistakes until that moment.
I am certain I have caused you great@pains as well.
You've been strict when it comes to me,
and I was childish enough to consider@you cold and unloving for it.
You said I was strong, but in truth,
I am no stronger than Mikage or@any other child.

group_1.textRight: There's no need to concern yourself@with how I perceive you.
More importantly, there's something@bigger on your mind, isn't there?
You said earlier that you wanted@to start over.
Was it in reference to one of@your relationships?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103701:lipSynch_1]My father and my mother.

group_1.textCenter: I think I need to do some self-reflection.
